utilities

Utilities Module

This module was created to define some useful parameters and the names of servers, nodes and topics, so that if the user wants to change them, they do not have to do so in every file, it is sufficient to change them here.

utilities.ExpRoLab_Assignment2.architecture_name_mapper.tag_log(msg, producer_tag)[source]

Function used to label each log with a producer tag.

Parameters

  • msg (Str) -- message that will be visualized

  • producer_tag (Str) -- tag identifying the log producer

Returns

message for the log

Return type

log_msg(Str)
